strIntroduction: Private Venice wine tours of Friuli feature two full wine tastings at celebrated wineries and scenic back roads.

strIntroduction: Before boarding your cuise ship in Venice, or after finishing your cruise in Venice, enjoy our 7-day Northern Italy vacation packages featuring Milan, Lake Como & Venice. the perfect compliment to your mediterranean cruise, with private door-to-door transfers, a special package of Venice tours including a Gondola ride, small Group walking tour & boat tour of the Grand Canal you'll enjoy a relaxing & stress free Italian vacation

strIntroduction: Semi-Private Italy vacations packages with exclusive small group Italy tours of Pompeii & Amalfi & the Cinque Terre, along with our popular small group tours of Rome, Florence & Venice make this a fully loaded package for the first-time visitor to get a full and intense experience of the best of Italy. strIntroduction: This is a great chance to visit one of world football's great temples. The Stadio Meazza or San Siro Stadium as is it is more commonly known is reputed to be one of the most astounding sports buildings in the world and is home to AC and Inter Milan, two of Italy's most illustrious clubs. We also tour the new home of AC Milan at Casa Milan, and discover their new state of the art museum, shop and enjoy a delicious lunch at its restaurant
strTitle: Football lovers tour

strIntroduction: Get priority entrance to Da Vinci’s Last Supper on this walking tour of Milan. Check out the hip bohemian scene of the Brera district, rub shoulders with greats at La Scala, shop in the boutique stores of Galleria Vittorio Manuele II, and much more.

strIntroduction: Take in the best of Milan’s fantastic landmarks and tourist attractions on the quick and convenient City Sightseeing hop-on/hop-off bus tour. From the beautiful Duomo to the Sforza Castle and everything in between, there is no better way to explore Europe’s most elegant city.

strIntroduction: Semi-Private 2016 10-Day Tuscany vacation packages combine sojourns in Rome, Tuscany, Florence & Venice to provide the perfect introduction to the many varied attractions of Italy. Including our small group Italy Tours, and Private transfers throughout the tours itinerary enjoy a relaxing and stress-fee vacation that can be customized to suit your own requirements!
strTitle: 10-Day Tuscany, Rome, Florence and Venice Trip

strIntroduction: See Florence on a comfortable and convenient hop-on hop-off bus tour. Travel on open-top double-decker buses that cover 3 routes. Your 1- or 3-day ticket, or 48-hour ticket, makes it possible to see all that Florence has to offer!

strIntroduction: See the very best of Lugano, Lake Como, and Bellagio while in the company of a local, English-speaking guide who will provide illuminating commentary throughout your experience.

strIntroduction: Discover Genoa, one of the most charming cities in Northern Italy with a glorious past. Spend your morning in the Birthplace of Christopher Columbus before finishing your day in Portofino, the pearl of the Ligurian sea with its quintessential feel and crystalline green waters.
strTitle: Genoa and Portofino

strIntroduction: Fine tune your skills on this Private Photography tour of Venice led by a professional Venice photographer!

strTitle: Small Group Renaissance & David Walk Florence Tours

strIntroduction: Ride through the evocative back canals of Venice on our Small Group Venice Gondola Tour to enjoy the best of Venice
strTitle: Venice Gondola Ride Experience

strIntroduction: Skip the long lines at the Vatican Museums and Sistine Chapel with exclusive no-wait access. On your small group tour, experience the best of the Vatican City in 3 hours, as you visit the Raphael Rooms, Sistine Chapel, St. Peter's Basilica, and more.
strTitle: No Wait: Vatican Museums, Sistine Chapel & St. Peter's

strIntroduction: Enjoy fast-track entry to Rome’s historic sites, such as St. Peter’s Basilica, the Vatican Museums, and the Colosseum, with a 3-day combined city pass. Get discounted entry to more than 30 sights, and explore Rome on the hop-on hop-off sightseeing bus.
strTitle: Vatican & Rome City Pass with Free Transportation

strIntroduction: Small group Rome day tours to Tuscany featuring Montalcino, Montepulciano, Pienza and the Brunello wine region with wine tastings at celebrated wineries producing the world famous Brunello wines. Intimate day tours of the most beautiful countryside Italy has to offer travelling in air-conditioned Mercedes minivans with English-speaking drivers
strTitle: Small Group Tuscany Day Tours from Rome

strIntroduction: Enjoy a private photo shoot at some of the top locations in Rome. A professional photographer will take photos of you during your travels, honeymoon, or wedding. Choose from 4 popular itineraries and receive beautifully edited digital photos.
strTitle: Rome Photo Friend Tour

strIntroduction: Visit top attractions in Venice and the islands of Murano and Burano in the Venice Lagoon in a single day. Skip the lines at St. Mark’s Basilica and the Doge’s Palace, take a boat to the islands, and see glassblowing and lace making demonstrations.
strTitle: Venice and Small Islands

strIntroduction: Leave Milan by high-speed train and spend the day sightseeing in Rome. After a 3.5-hour morning train journey to Rome, you’ll have the rest of the day to explore the historic city independently. Take a hop-on hop-off sightseeing tour and listen to audio commentary as you cruise around on an open-top double-decker bus to landmarks.
strTitle: Day Trip to Rome from Milan

strIntroduction: Get skip-the-line entry to one of the most iconic art galleries in Florence and explore the treasures of the Accademia. See masterpieces from the Medici collections of the Renaissance, as well as Michelangelo’s statue of David.
strTitle: Accademia Gallery Tickets with Fast Entrance

strIntroduction: Save money on luxury brands at Fidenza Village on a 8-hour shopping tour to a chic outlet shopping village. Discover more than 100 boutiques of prestigious fashion brands, and enjoy reductions of up to 70%. Get a VIP Fidenza Village Card to save even more
strTitle: Shopping Express: Fidenza Village Outlet

strIntroduction: Become acquainted with 3 classic Italian icons on a full-day tour from Florence to the Ferrari Museum, a balsamic vinegar estate, and a Parmesan cheese producer. Live the Ferrari Experience, and taste fine regional products.
strTitle: Ferrari Full-Day Tour

strIntroduction: This SIM card works in 31 different countries in Europe, provides 1250MB fast mobile internet/ data plus 300 minutes calls in 31 countries in Europe.
strTitle: 30 Days Europe Prepaid Sim Card

strIntroduction: Explore the Villa Barbaro, Villa Emo & Villa Malcontenta with an expert Palladian guide!
strTitle: Private Palladio Villa Tour

strIntroduction: Take to the waters edge and enliven your spirit by touring the nightlife along Milan's ancient Navigli canals. These picturesque canals, which once connected the entire city, are now the heart and soul of Milanese nightlife. Come join in fun beneath the moon and stars as you explore your splendid surroundings.
strTitle: Wine and Appetizers on the Ancient Navigli Canals in Milan

strIntroduction: Explore Milan according to your own interests with a 48-hour Milan Pass, and enjoy discounts at dozens of affiliated restaurants, shops, museums, shows and more.
strTitle: The Milan Pass

strIntroduction: Focusing on the highlights of Venice, this tour is perfect for those who want a introductory private tour of Venice
strTitle: Private Highlights of Venice Walk

strIntroduction: Find designer bargains at the amazing FoxTown Factory Stores, located just 45 minutes outside Milan, in Switzerland. On this 6-hour tour you can shop 'til you drop and enjoy discounts of 30-70 percent! Visit the beauty center or the casino on site.
strTitle: Fox Town outlet in Switzerland from Milan

strIntroduction: Explore Salzburg, the city Mozart called home, and the countryside featured in "The Sound of Music"
strTitle: Salzburg and the Lake District

strIntroduction: Live a real-life fairytale on a trip to the storybook castles of Neuschwanstein and Linderhof!
strTitle: Neuschwanstein & Linderhof Royal Castle and Oberammergau Tour from Munich

strIntroduction: Visit the magical Königssee in the Berchtesgaden Alps of Bavaria. Explore Germany’s third deepest lake, a fjord-like body of water, surrounded by towering rock faces. Take a boat ride on the lake, and drive along some of the most scenic Alpine roads.
strTitle: Königssee Full-Day Tour from Munich

strIntroduction: Visit the UNESCO world heritage site of the Rhine Valley, its vineyards, and picturesque little towns and villages. You'll taste the local wines on site, see the mighty mediaeval castles – and maybe even the "Lorelei", the legendary maiden of the Rhine.
strTitle: Rhine Valley tour

strIntroduction: Experience the unforgettable beauty of Swabia's Nördlinger Ries. Visit Harburg Castle, an amazingly-preserved mediaeval castle never damaged by war. Wander through the streets of Rothenburg, a beautifully restored mediaeval town.
strTitle: Romantic Road Rothenburg and Harburg

strIntroduction: “Baden-Baden is so nice you have to name it twice.” - Former U.S. President Bill Clinton
strTitle: Baden-Baden / Strasbourg-Alsace

strIntroduction: Take a day to explore the romantic city of Heidelberg, coupled with the rich history of Nuremberg. Offering a bit of past and present, you're sure to have a day to remember.
strTitle: Heidelberg and Nuremberg Tour

strIntroduction: Climb aboard for a day trip experiencing Dresden with your own private bus and guide. Learn about Dresden through the ages, from the Saxon Kings to the post-communist era. And learn of the rich cultural and artistic heritages this town has to offer.
strTitle: Daytrip to Dresden from Berlin

strIntroduction: The Berlin Wall split not just the city and Germany in two but the entire world for almost 30 years. The emotional, physical and psychological scars it left behind will take generations to heal.
strTitle: Berlin Wall and Cold War Bike Tour

strIntroduction: Step inside Sachsenhauser, the concentration camp that set the standard for all those that followed. Learn of the site’s terrible history and see poignant memorials, such as the killing center, gallows, and more.
strTitle: Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Memorial Walking Tour

strIntroduction: 高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！取機還機超方便。
strTitle: Europe Pocket WiFi

strIntroduction: Visit the heart of Munich's beer and food culture, spend 3 hours sampling the best of traditional Bavarian food and beer, with an exclusive tour of the Oktoberfest Museum the best of local beer halls and the Hofbräuhaus.
strTitle: Bavarian Beer and Food Evening Tour in Munich

strIntroduction: Explore all the main attractions of Berlin on a half-day guided bike tour. Explore the city’s unique history, from the Prussian Empire, to the days of the Third Reich, the city split by the Berlin Wall, and reunification after the fall of the wall.
strTitle: Berlin Bike Tour

strIntroduction: Discover the enchanting beauty of Heidelberg and the modern vibe of Frankfurt on this comprehensive tour of both cities. Plus, not only will you be taken to the most interesting sites in these two unparalleled cities.
strTitle: Heidelberg and Frankfurt City Tour（Start from Frankfurt）

strIntroduction: Take to the water and explore Dresden and its verdant surroundings by boat. On a two and a half hour cruise you’ll be able to absorb the city’s magical panorama from a different point of view, as well as the leafy landscapes of the Elbe River Valley.
strTitle: Dresden by Boat along the River Elbe

strIntroduction: See the sights of the scenic city of Freiburg on a 1.5-hour guided tour. Stroll to some of the most beautiful spots, such as the Freiburg Minster on Münsterplatz. Walk down some of the small alleys to find the famous “Freiburg Bächle.”
strTitle: Freiburg: 1.5-Hour Guided Tour

strIntroduction: Explore Munich at your own pace on a hop-on hop-off bus tour. Get on and off the double-decker bus as often as you please with your full-day ticket. See all the highlights of Bavaria’s capital city including Odeonsplatz, the Pinatheken, and Marienplatz.
strTitle: Hop on Hop off Grand Circle

strIntroduction: Experience an exciting guided walking tour of Böttcherstraße, one of the most beloved tourist attractions in Bremen. See historic buildings from between 1922 and 1931 and learn more about the area's development.
strTitle: Bremen: Guided Walking Tour of Böttcherstraße

strIntroduction: Start your fantastic journey in Europa-Park, the best theme park in Germany!
strTitle: Europa-Park（ one／two day ticket ）

strIntroduction: Explore the heart of Berlin by boat on a comprehensive cruise that takes you from west to east past the city sites.
strTitle: Berlin River Cruise

strIntroduction: Experience the contrasting diversity of the city of Frankfurt, where history subtly blends with modernity, and the spectacular landscape of the Rhine valley.
strTitle: Frankfurt city and Rhine Valley tour

strIntroduction: This is a private 1-way airport transfer in a 3 seat luxury sedan from Franz Josef Strauss International Airport to Munich. All year round, 24 hour, punctual, safe, and truly global. All transfers are 100% carbon offset.
strTitle: Green Path Private One Way Transfer from Munich Airport

strIntroduction: The Berlin Sightseeing Pass is the only pass which allows you free access to over 55 top museums and attractions around the city!
strTitle: Berlin Pass with Transport

strIntroduction: 一張德鐵通票（German Rail Pass FLEXI ）讓你在德國自助旅行暢通無阻。30 天內任選 7 天無限制搭乘 DB 運營的 IC、EC、ICE Sprinter、ICE 火車，甚至還能到鄰近國家玩。德鐵通票絕對是你遊覽德國最便利且必備的工具！
strTitle: German Rail Pass FLEXI (7 days)

strIntroduction: Explore Berlin’s dark past on a guided tour of its former Nazi buildings, Soviet war memorials, and Hitler’s bunker. Learn how Hitler rose to power and turned Berlin into an extension of the Nazi machine on this Third Reich half-day walking tour.
strTitle: Berlin's Infamous Third Reich Sites Half-Day Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Explore Bremen onboard a comfortable bus on this sighseeing tour. Discover the main attractions in the Art Nouveau district of Schwachhausen, the alternative Ostertor district, and the interesting Überseestadt neighborhood.
strTitle: Bremen Sightseeing Bus Tour

strIntroduction: Discover the historical sites that were the origins of the Nazi party and the German resistance movement
strTitle: Munich Under the Third Reich and the German Resistance

strIntroduction: Create your own personal vision of Berlin. Discover the bustling German capital at your leisure.
strTitle: City circle Hop on-Hop off Tour

strIntroduction: Explore the variety of Frankfurt, from the Coronation City of the German Emperors to the modern European Banking Centre, is one of the most breath-taking cities in Germany!
strTitle: Frankfurt City Hop on Hop off Tour

strIntroduction: Discover a piece of history and admire the fascinating architecture of the Semperoper in Dresden on a 45-minute guided tour. Explore one of the most beautiful and prestigious opera houses in the world, and learn about the history of this grand building.
strTitle: Dresden: Semperoper Tickets and 45-Minute Guided Tour

strIntroduction: Join this 2-hour guided walking tour and explore Hamburg's infamous Red Light District. Learn about the historical background of the district and why the widely practiced profession in this quarter became so popular. Tour the shady and scandalous streets of city and enjoy a unique Hamburg experience.
strTitle: St. Pauli Neighborhood And Red Light District Walking Tour in Hamburg

strIntroduction: Berlin without Potsdam is like Paris without Versailles - leave Berlin without a trip to its royal residence, and you can't say you've seen Berlin! Begin with a train ride from Berlin to Potsdam and discover this fascinating city with a walking tour.
strTitle: Discover Potsdam Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Lasting barely 12 years, the harrowing period of the Third Reich left a legacy of death and destruction the scars of which are still visible today. This powerful and emotional half-day bike tour explores these open wounds.
strTitle: Third Reich and Nazi Germany Bike Tour

strIntroduction: For 40 years Hard Rock Cafe has been synonymous with action, entertainment and good food. Since the beginning Hard Rock Cafe has offered traditional, freshly prepared American food in a rock'n'roll atmosphere.
strTitle: Hard Rock Cafe Munich – skip the line

strIntroduction: Experience the old-world charm of Germany's romantic Heidelberg and the Rhine river, as you spend a day touring this delightful combination of rich history and natural beauty.
strTitle: Explore Heidelberg and the Rhine Valley

strIntroduction: Unravel a distinctive past and uncover a unique character today on this tour of Hidden Berlin that takes you to some of the major sights of the city and also reveals some hidden gems. Let the professional guide lead you through places of historical and social importance, explaining the background and the real stories of the people of Berlin.
strTitle: Hidden Berlin
